Pilot.Name: Prince Xizor
Pilot.Ability: When defending, a friendly ship at Range 1 may suffer 1 uncancelled {hit} or {crit} result instead of you.

Pilot.Name: Guri
Pilot.Ability: At the start of the Combat phase, if you are at Range 1 of an enemy ship, you may assign 1 focus token to your ship

Pilot.Name: Dace Bonearm
Pilot.Ability: When an enemy ship at Range 1-3 receives at least 1 ion token, if you are not stressed, you may receive 1 stress token to cause that ship to suffer 1 damage.

Pilot.Name: Palob Godalhi
Pilot.Ability: At the start of the Combat phase, you may remove 1 focus or evade token from an enemy ship at Range 1-2 and assign it to yourself.

Pilot.Name: Torkhil Mux
Pilot.Ability: At the end of the Activation phase, choose 1 enemy ship at Range 1-2. Until the end of the Combat phase, treat that ship's pilot skill value as "0".

Pilot.Name: Kavil
Pilot.Ability: When attacking a ship outside your firing arc, roll 1 additional attack die.

Pilot.Name: Drea Renthal
Pilot.Ability: After you spend a target lock, you may receive 1 stress token to acquire a target lock.

Pilot.Name: N'Dru Suhlak
Pilot.Ability: When attacking, if there are no other friendly ships at Range 1-2, roll 1 additional attack die.

Pilot.Name: Kaa'to Leeachos
Pilot.Ability: At the start of the Combat phase, you may remove 1 focus or evade token from another friendly ship at Range 1-2 and assign it to yourself.

Pilot.Name: Serissu
Pilot.Ability: When another friendly ship at Range 1 is defending, he may reroll 1 defense dice.

Pilot.Name: Laetin A'shera
Pilot.Ability: After you defend against an attack, if the attack did not hit, you may assign 1 evade token to your ship.

Pilot.Name: Talonbane Cobra
Pilot.Ability: When attacking or defending, double the effect of your range combat bonuses.

Pilot.Name: Graz the Hunter
Pilot.Ability: When defending, if the attacker is inside your firing arc, roll 1 additional defense die.

Pilot.Name: Zuckuss
Pilot.Ability: When attacking you may roll 1 additional attack die. If you do, the defender rolls 1 additional defense die.

Pilot.Name: 4-LOM
Pilot.Ability: At the start of the End phase, you may assign 1 of your stress tokens to another ship at Range 1.

Pilot.Name: Boba Fett
Pilot.Ability: When attacking or defending, you may reroll 1 of your dice for each enemy at Range 1.

Pilot.Name: Kath Scarlet
Pilot.Ability: When attacking a ship inside your auxiliary firing arc, roll 1 additional die.

Pilot.Name: Emon Azzameen
Pilot.Ability: When dropping a bomb, you may use the [3{Left Bank}], [3{Straight}] or [3{Right Bank}] template instead of the [1{Straight}] template.

Pilot.Name: IG88-A
Pilot.Ability: After you perform an attack that destroys the defender, you may recover 1 shield.

Pilot.Name: IG88-B
Pilot.Ability: Once per round, after you perform an attack that does not hit, you may perform an attack with an equipped {Cannon} secondary weapon.

Pilot.Name: IG88-C
Pilot.Ability: After you perform a boost action, you may perform a free evade action.

Pilot.Name: IG88-D
Pilot.Ability: You may execute the {sloopleft} or {sloopright} manoeuvre using the corresponding [{leftturn}3] or [{rightturn}3] template.

Pilot.Name: Bossk
Pilot.Ability: When you perform an attack that hits, before dealing damage, you may cancel 1 of your {crit} results to add 2 {hit} results.

Pilot.Name: Moralo Eval
Pilot.Ability: You can perform {cannon} secondary weapon attacks against ships inside your auxiliary firing arc.

Pilot.Name: Latts Razzi
Pilot.Ability: When a friendly ship declares an attack, you may spend a target lock you have on the defender to reduce its agility by 1 for that attack.

Pilot.Name: Dengar
Pilot.Ability: Once per round after defending, if the attacker is inside your firing arc, you may perform an attack against that ship.

Pilot.Name: Tel Trevura
Pilot.Ability: The first time you would be destroyed, instead cancel any remaining damage, discard all Damage cards, and deal 4 facedown Damage cards to this ship.

Pilot.Name: Manaroo
Pilot.Ability: At the start of the Combat phase, you may assign all focus, evade, and target lock tokens assigned to you to another friendly ship.

Pilot.Name: Tycho Celchu
Pilot.Ability: You may perform actions while you have a stress token.

Pilot.Name: Jake Farrell
Pilot.Ability: After you perform focus action or are assigned a focus token, you may perform a free boost or barrel roll action.

Pilot.Name: Arvel Crynyd
Pilot.Ability: You may declare an enemy ship inside your firing arc that you are touching as the target of your attaack.

Pilot.Name: Gemmer Sojan
Pilot.Ability: While you are at Range 1 of at least 1 enemy ship, increase your agility value by 1.

Pilot.Name: Ten Numb
Pilot.Ability: When attacking, 1 of your {crit} results cannot be cancelled by defense dice.

Pilot.Name: Keyan Farlander
Pilot.Ability: When attacking, you may remove 1 stress token to change all of your {focus} results to {hit} results.

Pilot.Name: Ibtisam
Pilot.Ability: When attacking or defending, if you have at least one stress token, you may reroll 1 of your dice.

Pilot.Name: Nera Dantels
Pilot.Ability: You can perform {torpedo} secondary weapon attacks at ships outside your firing arc.

Pilot.Name: Corran Horn
Pilot.Ability: At the start of the End phase, you may perform 1 attack. You may not attack next round.

Pilot.Name: Etahn A'baht
Pilot.Ability: When an enemy ship inside your firing arc at Range 1-3 is defending, the attacker may change 1 of its {hit} results to a {crit}.

Pilot.Name: Jan Ors
Pilot.Ability: When another friendly ship at range 1-3 is attacking, if you have no stress tokens, you may receive 1 stress token to allow that ship to roll 1 additional attack die.

Pilot.Name: Kyle Katarn
Pilot.Ability: At the start of the Combat Phase, you may assign 1 of your focus tokens to another friendly ship at Range 1-3.

Pilot.Name: Roark Garnet
Pilot.Ability: At the start of the combat phase choose 1 other friendly ship at Range 1-3. Until the end of the phase, treat that pilot's pilot skill value as 12.

Pilot.Name: Miranda Doni
Pilot.Ability: Once per round when attacking, you may either spend 1 shield to roll 1 additional attack die or roll 1 fewer attack die to recover 1 shield.

Pilot.Name: Esege Tuketu
Pilot.Ability: When another friendly ship at Range 1-2 is attacking, it may treat your focus tokens as its own.

Pilot.Name: Wedge Antilles
Pilot.Ability: When attacking, reduce the defender's agility value by 1 (to a minimum of 0).

Pilot.Name: Wes Janson
Pilot.Ability: After you perform an attack, you may remove 1 focus, evade or blue target lock token from the defender.

Pilot.Name: Luke Skywalker
Pilot.Ability: When defending, you may change 1 of your {focus} results to an {evade} result.

Pilot.Name: Jek Porkins
Pilot.Ability: When you receive a stress token, you may remove it and roll 1 attack die. On a {hit} result, deal 1 facedown damage card to this ship.

Pilot.Name: Garven Dreis
Pilot.Ability: After spending a focus token, you may place that token on any other friendly ship at Range 1-2 (instead of discarding it).

Pilot.Name: Biggs Darklighter
Pilot.Ability: Other friendly ships at Range 1 cannot be targeted by attacks if the attacker could target you instead.

Pilot.Name: "Hobbie" Klivian
Pilot.Ability: When you aquire or spend a target lock you may remove 1 stress token from your ship.

Pilot.Name: Tarn Mison
Pilot.Ability: When an enemy ship declares you as the target of an attack, you may acquire a target lock on that ship.

Pilot.Name: Horton Salm
Pilot.Ability: When attacking at Range 2-3 you may reroll any of your blank results.

Pilot.Name: "Dutch" Vander
Pilot.Ability: After aquiring a target lock, choose another friendly ship at Range 1-2. The ship may immediately aquire a target lock.

Pilot.Name: Airen Cracken
Pilot.Ability: After you perform an attack, you may choose another friendly ship at Range 1. That ship may perform 1 free action.

Pilot.Name: Lieutenant Blount
Pilot.Ability: When attacking, the defender is hit by your attack, even if he does not suffer any damage.

Pilot.Name: Poe Dameron
Pilot.Ability: When attacking or defending, if you have a focus token, you may change 1 of your {focus} results to a {hit} or {evade} result.

Pilot.Name: Ello Asty
Pilot.Ability: While you are not stressed, you may treat your {talon roll left} and {talon roll right} maneuvers as white maneuvers.

Pilot.Name: "Red Ace"
Pilot.Ability: The first time you remove a shield token from your ship each round, assign 1 evade token to your ship.

Pilot.Name: "Blue Ace"
Pilot.Ability: When performing a boost action, you may use the [{left turn} 1] or [{right turn} 1] template.

Pilot.Name: Han Solo
Pilot.Ability: When attacking, you may reroll all of your dice. If you choose to do so, you must reroll as many of your dice as possible.

Pilot.Name: Lando Calrissian
Pilot.Ability: After you execute a green maneuver, choose one other friendly ship at Range 1. That ship may perform 1 free action on its action bar.

Pilot.Name: Chewbacca
Pilot.Ability: When you are dealt a faceup damage card, immediately flip it facedown (without resolving its ability).

Pilot.Name: Dash Rendar
Pilot.Ability: You may ignore obstacles during the Activation phase and when performing actions.

Pilot.Name: "Leebo"
Pilot.Ability: When you are dealth a faceup Damage card, draw 1 additional Damage card, choose 1 to resolve and discard the other.

Pilot.Name: Eaden Vrill
Pilot.Ability: When performing a primary weapon attack against a stressed ship, roll 1 additional attack dice.

Pilot.Name: Hera Syndulla
Pilot.Ability: When you reveal a green or red maneuver, you may change your dial to another manuever of the same difficulty.

Pilot.Name: Kanan Jarrus
Pilot.Ability: When an enemy ship at Range 1-2 is attacking, you may spend a focus token. If you do, the attacker rolls 1 fewer attack die.

Pilot.Name: "Chopper"
Pilot.Ability: At the start of the Combat phase, each enemy ship you are touching receives 1 stress token.

Pilot.Name: Hera Syndulla
Pilot.Ability: When you reveal a green or red maneuver, you may change your dial to another manuever of the same difficulty.

Pilot.Name: Sabine Wren
Pilot.Ability: Immediately before you reveal your maneuver, you may perform a free boost or barrel roll action.

Pilot.Name: Ezra Bridger
Pilot.Ability: When defending, if you are stressed, you may change up to 2 of your {focus} results to {evade} results.

Pilot.Name: "Zeb" Orrelios
Pilot.Ability: When defending, you may cancel {crit} results before {hit} results.

Pilot.Name: "Howlrunner"
Pilot.Ability: When another friendly ship at Range 1 is attacking with its primary weapon, it may reroll 1 attack die.

Pilot.Name: Mauler Mithel
Pilot.Ability: When attacking at Range 1, roll 1 additional attack die.

Pilot.Name: "Scourge"
Pilot.Ability: When attacking a defender that has 1 or more Damage cards, roll 1 additional attack die.

Pilot.Name: Dark Curse
Pilot.Ability: When defending, ships attacking you cannot spend focus tokens or reroll attack dice.

Pilot.Name: Backstabber
Pilot.Ability: When attacking from outside the defender's firing arc, roll 1 additional attack die.

Pilot.Name: "Youngster"
Pilot.Ability: Friendly TIE Fighters at Range 1-3 may perform the action on your equipped {Elite Pilot Talent} Upgrade card.

Pilot.Name: Winged Gundark
Pilot.Ability: When attacking at Range 1, you may change 1 of your {hit} results to a {crit} result.

Pilot.Name: Night Beast
Pilot.Ability: After executing a green manoeuvre, you may perform a free focus action.

Pilot.Name: "Wampa"
Pilot.Ability: When attacking, you may cancel all dice results. If you cancel a {crit} result, deal 1 facedown Damage card to the defender.

Pilot.Name: "Chaser"
Pilot.Ability: When another friendly ship at Range 1 spends a focus token, assign a focus token to your ship.

Pilot.Name: Darth Vader
Pilot.Ability: During your "Perform Action" step, you may perform 2 actions.

Pilot.Name: Juno Eclipse
Pilot.Ability: When you reveal your maneuver, you may increase or decrease its speed by 1 (to a minimum of 1).

Pilot.Name: Maarek Stele
Pilot.Ability: When your attack deals a faceup Damage card to the defender, instead draw 3 Damage cards, choose 1 to deal, and discard the others.

Pilot.Name: Zertik Strom
Pilot.Ability: Enemy ships at Range 1 cannot add their range combat bonus when attacking.

Pilot.Name: Commander Alozen
Pilot.Ability: At the start of the Combat phase, you may acquire a target lock on an enemy ship at Range 1.

Pilot.Name: Lieutenant Colzet
Pilot.Ability: At the start of the End phase, you may spend a target lock you have on an enemy ship to flip 1 random facedown Damage card assigned to it faceup.

Pilot.Name: Tomax Bren
Pilot.Ability: Once per round, after you discard an {elite pilot talent} Upgrade card, flip that card faceup.

Pilot.Name: Major Rhymer
Pilot.Ability: When attacking with a secondary weapon, you may increase or decrease the weapon range by 1 to a limit of Range 1-3.

Pilot.Name: Captain Jonus
Pilot.Ability: When another friendly ship at Range 1 attacks with a secondary weapon, it may reroll up to 2 attack dice.

Pilot.Name: Rexler Brath
Pilot.Ability: After you perform an attack that deals at least 1 Damage card to the defender, you may spend a focus token to flip those cards faceup.

Pilot.Name: Colonel Vessery
Pilot.Ability: When attacking, immediately after you roll attack dice, you may acquire a target lock on the defender if it already has a red target lock token.

Pilot.Name: Soontir Fel
Pilot.Ability: When you receive a stress token, you may assign 1 focus token to your ship.

Pilot.Name: Carnor Jax
Pilot.Ability: Enemy ships at Range 1 cannot perform focus or evade actions and cannot spend focus or evade tokens.

Pilot.Name: Turr Phennir
Pilot.Ability: After you perform an attack, you may perform a free boost or barrel roll action.

Pilot.Name: Tetran Cowell
Pilot.Ability: When you reveal a {k-turn} maneuver, you may treat the speed of that meaneuver as "1", "3" or "5".

Pilot.Name: Kir Kanos
Pilot.Ability: When attacking at Range 2-3, you may spend 1 evade token to add one {hit} result to you roll.

Pilot.Name: Lieutenant Lorrir
Pilot.Ability: When performing a barrel roll action, you may receive 1 stress token to use the 1 {left bank} or {right bank} template instead of the 1 {straight} template.

Pilot.Name: "Fel's Wrath"
Pilot.Ability: When the number of damage cards assigned to you equals or exceeds your hull value, you are not destroyed unti the end of the round.

Pilot.Name: "Whisper"
Pilot.Ability: After you perform an attack that hits, you may assign 1 focus token to your ship.

Pilot.Name: "Echo"
Pilot.Ability: When you decloak, you must use the 2 {left bank} or 2 {right bank} template instead of the 2 {straight} template.

Pilot.Name: "Redline"
Pilot.Ability: You may maintain 2 target locks on the same ship. When you acquire a target lock, you may acquire a second lock on that ship.

Pilot.Name: "Deathrain"
Pilot.Ability: When dropping a bomb, you may use the front guides of your ship. After dropping a bomb you may perform a free barrel roll action.

Pilot.Name: The Inquisitor
Pilot.Ability: When attacking with your primary weapon at Range 2-3, treat the range of the attack as Range 1.

Pilot.Name: Valen Rudor
Pilot.Ability: After defending, you may perform a free action.

Pilot.Name: "Omega Leader"
Pilot.Ability: Enemy ships that you have locked cannot modify any dice when attacking you or defending against your attacks.

Pilot.Name: "Omega Ace"
Pilot.Ability: When attacking, you may spend a focus token and a target lock you have on the defender to change all of your dice results to {crit} results.

Pilot.Name: "Zeta Leader"
Pilot.Ability: When attacking, if you are not stressed, you may receive 1 stress token to roll 1 additional attack die.

Pilot.Name: "Epsilon Leader"
Pilot.Ability: At the start of the Combat phase, remove 1 stress token from each friendly ship at range 1.

Pilot.Name: "Zeta Ace"
Pilot.Ability: When performing a barrel roll, you may use the {straight} 2 template instead of the {straight} 1 template.

Pilot.Name: "Epsilon Ace"
Pilot.Ability: While you do not have any Damage cards, treat your pilot skill value as "12."

Pilot.Name: Boba Fett
Pilot.Ability: When you reveal a bank maneuver ({bank left} or {bank right}), you may rotate your dial to the other bank maneuver of the same speed.

Pilot.Name: Kath Scarlett
Pilot.Ability: When attacking, the defender receives 1 stress token if he cancels at least 1 {crit} result.

Pilot.Name: Krassis Trelix
Pilot.Ability: When attacking with a secondary weapon, you may reroll 1 attack die.

Pilot.Name: Captain Kagi
Pilot.Ability: When an enemy ship acquires a target lock, it must lock onto your ship if able.

Pilot.Name: Colonel Jendon
Pilot.Ability: At the start of the Combat Phase, you may assign 1 of your blue target lock tokens to a friendly ship at Range 1 if it does not have a blue target lock token.

Pilot.Name: Captain Yorr
Pilot.Ability: When another friendly ship at Range 1-2 would receive a stress token, if you have 2 or fewer stress tokens, you may receive that token instead.

Pilot.Name: Rear Admiral Chiraneau
Pilot.Ability: When attacking at Range 1-2, you may change 1 of your {focus} results to a {crit} result.

Pilot.Name: Commander Kenkirk
Pilot.Ability: If you have no shields and at least 1 Damage card assigned to you, increase your agility value by 1.

Pilot.Name: Captain Oicunn
Pilot.Ability: After executing a maneuver, each enemy ship you are touching suffers 1 Damage.

Pilot.Name: Gozanti-class Cruiser
Pilot.Ability: After executing a maneuver, you may deploy up to 2 docked ships.
